titles.title: Vital STATS Act of 2020
Vital Standardization of Thoughtful Administrative Techniques and Statistics Act of 2020
Vital STATS Act of 2020

To direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to enter into an agreement with the National Academy of Medicine under which the National Academy agrees to conduct a one-year study assessing the effectiveness of current vital statistics reporting and data sharing between State, local, and Federal agencies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Vital Standardization of Thoughtful Administrative Techniques and Statistics Act of 2020 or the Vital STATS Act of 2020
This bill requires the Department of Health and Human Services to enter into an agreement with the National Academy of Medicine to study coordination and standardization of vital-statistics reporting and data sharing between federal, state, and local agencies.
